name: Volunteer Management
description: A full-stack volunteer management web application where admins can post events and volunteers can register, track participation, and view upcoming opportunities.

name: Plant Care
description: A full-stack plant management app where users can track and care for their plants with personalized CRUD features, secure auth, theme toggle, and responsive UI.

name: Subscription Box
description: A responsive subscription platform showcasing curated tech boxes with detailed product views. Features secure authentication and protected routes for accessing premium content.
